resources.string: The signing-in process isn\'t completed yet. If you see the confirmation page from Twitter then please wait a few more seconds and it will finish automatically.\n\nWould you like to cancel signing in?
Could not contact Twitter. Please try again.

Fix a few issues with the date option.
-Fix possible FCs when restarting messages.
-Add ability to move app to SD.
-Add hardware acceleration for supported devices.
-App now uses ActionBarSherlock, a compatibility library that allows for seamless ICS style actionbar behavior on 2.x devices!
-Begin Facebook integration.
-Starting messages on boot is not currently working, but I am working on getting it fixed.
